verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Spirit of God, move
Write your words in my heart
Fill my whole being
consume my life.
Spirit of God, move
An empty vessel I want to be,
So that you can come,
Lord and fill me.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I lift my hands, I surrender
laying all on the altar
I don't want to pretend
but be sealed by your hand
I'll take your word,
and I'll hide it in my heart.
Till every fiber in my being
Has desperate cry

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I've recognised your voice
and I've understood the call
Lord help me not to faint
but stand and overcome
Lord, I just want to please you
That's all I want to do
So from my soul now,
I cry to You
